instructions: First, make sure you're logged into your Mac and iPhone using the same Apple ID. This is how messages are sent and received between both devices. On your iPhone, open Settings . Scroll down and tap Messages . Tap Text Message Forwarding and toggle the switch to the on position for the Mac you wish to receive your text messages on. On your Mac, open the Messages app and click Preferences from the Messages menu. Click Enable This Account to ensure you can receive text messages using your Apple ID. Select the correct phone number and email address you wish to use for messaging. Now, you've synced your text messages to your iPhone and your Mac.
